list.name: cluster
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "elasticsearch_process" WITH KEY = "cluster_name"

list.name: node
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "elasticsearch_process" WITH KEY = "node_name" WHERE "cluster_name"='$cluster'

list.name: hosts
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "elasticsearch_process" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE "cluster_name"='$cluster'
